scripts.headless bdd start Chrome Mac: export BROWSER=chrome MAX_INSTANCE=1 HEADLESS=Y ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_demo'
scripts.headless bdd start Edge Mac: export BROWSER=MicrosoftEdge MAX_INSTANCE=1 HEADLESS=N ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_demo'
scripts.headless bdd start Firefox Mac: export BROWSER=firefox MAX_INSTANCE=1 HEADLESS=Y ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_demo'
scripts.headless bdd api.feature Mac: export HEADLESS=Y ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@api'
scripts.headed bdd ui interactions Mac: export HEADLESS=N ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_interact'
scripts.headed bdd wdiopobj.feature Mac: export HEADLESS=N ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@wdio_pageobjects'
scripts.headless bdd start Firefox Win: cross-env BROWSER=firefox MAX_INSTANCE=1 HEADLESS=Y ENV=QA && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_demo'
